author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Tourism Malaysia Experience Malaysia OctoberTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Tourism Malaysia Experience Malaysia October
The Malaysia Year of Festivals has entered the last quarter of 2015 but many exciting events are still in store for tourists. Fans of the Malaysian MotoGP would be thrilled to know that the annual race is back for the 25th year while golfers would be excited to see the return of CIMB Classic – PGA Tour. The general public can participate in the BSN Putrajaya Night Marathon and enjoy the beauty of the federal administrative capital at night.
October is also the month for foodies as the Malaysia International Gourmet Festival returns for the 12th year. Besides that, this is also the month for arts and culture enthusiasts. Among the not to be missed events include the unique International Aborigines Art Festival, Citrawarna@Kuala Lumpur, and Putrajaya International Islamic Arts & Culture Festival.
Before I conclude, I would like to take this opportunity to introduce to you The Haven, a luxury resort located in Bandar Baru Medan Ipoh. It is the first and only 5-star luxury resort in Ipoh, Perak.
Till then, I hope you’ll enjoy all the exciting events for this month!
Azizah Aziz
Director of Corporate Communication, Tourism Malaysia
Source:- Tourism Malaysia
